# detail

**Instance Property**

The text that the template displays below or beside the item’s title.

## Declaration

```swift
var detail: String? { get }
```

## Accessing the Item’s Attributes

- **title**: The text that the template displays as the item’s title.

items.description: The text that the template displays as the item’s title.
items.name: title

title: detail
